steps.step: Warm up olive oil in a 10" or 12" skillet.
Mix the corn meal and Old Bay seasoning thoroughly, then spread out on a platter.Coat tilapia fillets lightly, but thoroughly with corn meal and Old Bay mixture.

Lay coated fillets in hot olive oil (medium-medium high heat) and cook until golden on the bottom, then turn fillets over and repeat.Do not overcook the fish--it's easy to do.While fillets are cooking, combine Miracle Whip, sweet relish, and lemon juice and stir until well blended, then serve with the fish.It's quick, easy, and doesn't require a lot of cleanup.Steamed carrots or broccoli and some form of potatoes go well with this.
